page.title: 12SNOOKER
page.content: It is a popular sport snooker.It is played on a table.Some tables have slate beds.This means underneath the cloth which is green coloured is a slate bed.If something hard hits the table the slate bed can break.If you pot a red it gives you one point,yellow two,green three,brown four,blue five,pink six,black seven. On a full size table there are 15 red balls and one ball of the other colours.The game uses cues.These are sticks with a tip.Which is a soft stuff.Some of the very best players in a touriment.Lots of money goes to the winner.This year,1985,the winner was Dennis Taylor.the white is used as the ball which can only hit the others.If the white goes in one of the six pockets it counts as four points to the other player.
